title: Frank Lloyd Wright Coaster Set—Taliesin Line Design
description:
Items designed as supporting characters gains attention with the addition of some legendary artwork. These coasters are printed with a pattern inspired by a series of Frank Lloyd Wright® (American, 1867–1959) textile designs named the “Taliesin Line,” which is used on decorative fabrics and wallpapers. Made of absorbent ceramic stone.

Each set includes four 4 ¼ x 4 ¼ in. coasters.
